Posts.Content: Hi, There are alternative treatments are available, don`t give up. Try RFQMR(cytotron) & biotheraphy(immunotheraphy). Try cyberknife for critical area like liver & brian. But these treatment will not cure the cancer. It will prolong life & quality of life. http://www.cytotron.com/ --> for more info.
Posts.Title: How much chemo is enough for results
